messages.subject: ATTENTION, please, all new members of this list
messages.msgSnippet: Below is something I ve just sent to a new member, and I have a couple of things to say about it:  I m in Maui today, not Albuquerque-as- usual.  For
messages.messageBody:
Below is something I've just sent to a new member, and I have a couple
of things to say about it: I'm in Maui today, not Albuquerque-as-
usual. For serious... I do have better things to do than return
posts. And yes, I could just approve "me too" posts, but I care SO
MUCH about the Always Learning list that I'm willing to keep it strong
and good even when the wind is blowing through palm trees ten feet
from me.

SO. ANYone who is the least bit unsure of why I would be writing this
should keep reading.
And thank you to those who DO read their intro e-mails and who are
careful when posting. This list is an extremely valuable resource.
Please help me keep it that way.

=================================================================


I'm sorry to be returning two in one day ... but this just isn't useful.

You've quoted more than you've written, and what you wrote isn't
adding to the discussion. It won't help anyone understanding
unschooling better, nor does it ask a question that can be answered in
such ways that other people have new ideas.

You've just joined the list, I see. It's too soon to post anything.
While you're reading and getting used to the list, please read these
two pages. One should have come as an intro, by e-mail. Both are in
files at the yahoogroups page, but are more easily read here:

http://sandradodd.com/lists/alwayslearningNEW
http://sandradodd.com/lists/alwayslearningPOSTS
Thanks,
Sandra
